comment:
PRE-REVIEW COMPLETE. RESULT: COMPLIANT. RECOMMEND.

FRONTMATTER VERIFICATION:
- title: "Verification Record (VR) Document Type" -- present and non-empty
- revision_summary: "Initial draft" -- present; CR-reference not required for v0.1 per SOP-001 Section 5.1

STRUCTURE VERIFICATION (SOP-002 Section 6):
All 12 required sections present and correctly numbered:
1. Purpose, 2. Scope (2.1 Context, 2.2 Changes Summary, 2.3 Files Affected), 3. Current State, 4. Proposed State, 5. Change Description (5.1-5.6), 6. Justification, 7. Impact Assessment (7.1-7.5 including Development Controls and Qualified State Continuity), 8. Testing Summary (Automated and Integration), 9. Implementation Plan (Phases 1-8), 10. Execution (18 EIs with pre/post-execution commits per SOP-004 Section 5), 11. Execution Summary, 12. References.

PLACEHOLDER CHECK:
- TBD/TODO/FIXME/XXX: None found
- {{...}} design-time placeholders: None found (all replaced)
- [...] execution-time placeholders: Present only in Sections 10-11 (correct)

TRACEABILITY:
- References SOP-001, SOP-002, SOP-004, SOP-005, SOP-006 (all EFFECTIVE)
- References CR-082 (precedent), CR-084 (driving requirement), Session-2026-02-16-004 (design origin)
- Parent Document: None (design-driven improvement) -- consistent with context

EI TABLE:
- 18 items (EI-01 through EI-18)
- Column structure matches TEMPLATE-CR (EI, Task Description, Execution Summary, Task Outcome, Performed By - Date)
- EI-01 is pre-execution commit, EI-18 is post-execution commit (SOP-004 Section 5 compliant)
- EI-02 through EI-17 map to Implementation Plan Phases 1-8

QUALIFIED STATE CONTINUITY (Section 7.5):
- Before CR: EFFECTIVE v14.0/v18.0, CLI-9.0
- During execution: Unchanged, DRAFT, CLI-9.0
- Post-approval: EFFECTIVE v15.0/v19.0, CLI-10.0
- All values are specific (no TBD placeholders)

FORMATTING: Consistent heading hierarchy, horizontal rules, bold/code/table formatting throughout.
TYPOS: None found.

No deficiencies identified. Document is procedurally compliant and technically well-structured.
